snippet: Braintree, a mobile payments company that provides the software that lets a number of popular start-ups, including Fab.com, Airbnb, Uber and LivingSocial, process payments on smartphones, acquired another payments company called Venmo, a service that...
abstract: Braintree, a mobile payments company that provides the software that lets a number of popular start-ups, including Fab.com, Airbnb, Uber and LivingSocial, process payments on smartphones, acquired another payments company called Venmo, a service that lets people send and receive money via text message.

headline.main: Braintree, a Payments Company, Buys Venmo for $26.2 Million
